transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, main Minakshi bol rahi hun. Aap bar bar mera call connect disconnect kar dete hain sir.
Customer: Main madam disconnect kar rahe hain. Aapko bhi pata lag raha hai aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi to aapse kya karein? Ek ghanta wait karein.
Executive: Sir, main hello hello sir, main hello hello bol rahi hun.
Customer: Abhi uske baad hello karte aap aapka hold hoga jab mera hold hoga hoga kisi mein se na. To aapki aawaz hi nahi aa rahi thi. Main kaat hi diya.
Executive: Sir, aap bataiye aapne customer care mein call kiya tha.
Customer: Main aaram se Shahnawaz se jab lead pe aayega ki chutti mein unse keh dijiyega ki jo concern tha unse pooch lijiyega jabse unse baat ho. Hai na to wohi wali dikkat phir aa rahi hai.
Executive: Kya kya kya?
Customer: Na Shahnawaz se pooch lijiyega na ki jo pehle bataya tha na un logon ne.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapki sold out lead ki jo issue hai na sir, sold out leads mein ek hi cheez kar payenge hum ki aapko zyada search karke lead ko buy karni hai. Bahut active rehna hoga platform pe ek yehi option hai sir.
Customer: Madam madam madam active kya raat din khol ke baithe thodi rahenge. Jo lead aati hai na jo hamari cheez hai dikkat hai wo ek minute mein hota bhi matlab ki are second mein ho paate hain 20 second 30 second mein. Bulk ke lead mein wo purchase nahi hoti hai.
Executive: Sir, bulk ke lead aapki purchase isliye nahi hoti hai kyunki aap se zyada kisi aur customer ka pattern bana hua hai.
Customer: Madam madam pattern bana hua hai to ya to jaye na. Kisi aur customer ka pattern bana hua hai isliye. Ye batao ye batao paanch paanch second mein kaise ho jayegi ye bhi to samjhiye.
Executive: Sir, micro second mein bhi lead expire hoti hai sir. Main aapko bas ek cheez ye keh rahi hun pehle to aap apne product ka na jitna minimum order quantity hai hum log wo update kar dete hain.
Customer: Kya keh rahi hain?
Executive: Sir, jaise aapki bulk wala order hai right aapko bulk ki jitni order chahiye pehle wo hume update karne ka option de dijiye. Hum log aapka wo bulk wala order ka update kar dete hain. Theek hai? Pehle. Dusra hum log jitna zyada aapke bulk ka detail sir order ka update kar denge na waise bhi aapko usme bhi relevancy hogi. Theek hai?
Customer: To madam ye cheez to Shahnawaz ko banani chahiye thi.
Executive: To sir main aapko haan aapko bulk ka aap mere ko minimum order quantity de dijiye. Kitna rehta hai piece main wo update karti hun. Aur aap na aap na agar aise random bhi hmm. Haan uska na aisa uska na aisa hota hai usme piece ke sath nahi chalta jaise ab kam se kam keh denge tab bhi isme dikkat hai zyada se zyada kare wo bhi dikkat hai. Dikkat kya hai iska na majorly kya hota hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye maximum main aapse hum log minimum se minimum range aapka poochte hain. Hum aisa nahi hai ki aapka aur zyada poochne lag jaate hain sir.
Customer: Haan wo zyada main ab keh de to wo aaye na us cheez ka to uska maksad koi nahi hai na.
Executive: Sir to wohi main aapse pooch rahi thi ki isko isme aap minimum order quantity bata dijiye main aapko search karne ka option bata rahi hun. Aap jitna zyada search karenge na waise ho jayega. Dusra main abhi aap na main aapko ye bata rahe ho kul mila ke ye bata rahe ho ki aap saare din ispe online raho jaise insta pe facebook pe rehte hain aise ispe raho hain.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap yahan pe online bhi rahoge na aapko filter lagana hi padega. Aapko apne category ke wise filter lagana hi padega. Aapka aapka aapka filter ke according aapko lagana hi padega.
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: To ye cheez hai sir sir dekhiye main aapse Shahnawaz ne kyun nahi batai thi. Maan lijiye aapko jab aapko ye pata hai cheezon ka to unko bhi pata hoga na is cheezon ka.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi bhi time hai hum aap mujhe ye bataiye ki aapke product ki minimum order quantity main kya update karun main.
Customer: Madam madam wo theek hai aap kar dogi theek hai aap solution nikaal dogi aap keh rahe ho. Lekin wo ye cheez unhe do mahine pehle hi pata hogi na usko.
Executive: Sir Shahnawaz ne ab kyun nahi bataya abhi to wo yahan hai nahi ki main aapko bula ke aapse poochun ki kis wajah se nahi bataya. Bataya aapko.
Customer: To phir ruko phir madam na aapke concern ke andar call karke to keh rahe the account manager change kar do koi aur aa jayega na.
Executive: Main change kar deti hun aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan kar do. Usme kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Theek hai main Shahnawaz main Shahnawaz mere paas Vibha hai Vibha Singh. Theek hai main usko assign kar deti hun.
Customer: Vibha hai madam ye hume koi proper guidance de.
Executive: Sir suniye main haan aapko main wohi bol rahi hun ki aapka jo profile hai main Vibha ko assign kar di hun pehla. Dusra main na aapka minimum order quantity aapke 105 product mere paas updated hai aap mujhe bataiye ki 105 mein kitna minimum order quantity update karni hai. Main aapka minimum haan minimum order quantity update kar deti hun. Aap online pe rahenge aapko kuch nahi karna hai aapko apna filter select karna hai. Aap jitna zyada filter select karoge utna hi zyada relevancy hogi. Matlab aap bulk ka filter lagao jis category mein aapko chahiye. Theek hai?
Customer: Achcha. Haan aap abhi mujhe bataiye ki aapka minimum order quantity kya update karun.
Customer: Madam iski is vishay mein na kal aap baat kar lijiyega kyunki is time na gadi load ho rahi hai.
Executive: To sir abhi jo aapne feedback haan feedback aapne jo khola tha call kiya tha use main band kar rahi hun. Main kal ka reminder laga ke aapko kal kitne baje call karna hai aap mujhe bata dijiye main aapko call karungi.
Customer: Subah subah madam subah ke time kar liya karo na 10 se 11 baje ke beech mein call kar leyo.
Executive: Main 9 to 6 office mein rehti hun 9:30 kar lo.
Customer: Nahi nahi wohi keh raha na ki haan 9:30 nahi karna aur haan 9:30 ke baad jis time karna hai us time kar leyo kyunki subah subah aadmi free hota hai.
Executive: Theek hai main 9:30 baje aapko call karti hun. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur ye wala feedback main aapka close kar rahi hun sir. Theek hai? Kal main 9:30 baje subah aapko office aake call karungi. To ye change karna hai ise kara dijiye.
Executive: Haan main change bhi kara de rahi hun hand to hand hi change kara rahi hun. Aur theek hai aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing sold out lead issue.

- Wants to talk to Shahnawaz about concerns.

- Wants proper guidance from account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive explained to search more for leads.

- Agreed to update minimum order quantity.

- Assigned Vibha as new account manager.

- Will call back next day at 9:30 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, minimum order quantity
